Summary: Yes whe have been seeing this for awial.

divs: Sighting Details I have been seeing all kind of UFO at my house at night. with my friend Walter. my name is Jose Sanchez and i have been seeing the UFO for a long time now. i was not a believer at first now i am 100%. tonight there have been like 17 ore more UFO and one came close and was very big. me my wife and kids and Walter saw them. they are here and i like to know are they friendly? or why are they here for so long? etc. please believe me tonight they have been very close Time active 9:10pm till 10:48pm Monday Aug,5 2013. Rome N.Y. 13440.
